alps.doc: A list of biological properties or annotations. Technically, containers for term-value pairs that can be used to extensively annotate an entity using a consistent vocabulary.

descriptor.doc: An ontology or property term, e.g. efo:0002029 or sio:010066. Free text works as well.
A value assigned to an ontology or property term. For example a software name and version assigned to sio:010066 (sequence alignment) or a genotype assigned to efo:0000513 (genotype).
